job.title: Machine Learning Engineer
job.industry: Hospital & Health Care,Information Technology and Services
job.description:
Position:&nbsp;Machine Learning EngineerLocation:&nbsp;100% RemoteDuration:&nbsp;6-month Contract-to-HireStart:&nbsp;ASAP&nbsp;Job Description/Objective:This will be a 6-month contract with full-time employee conversion. This is a 100% remote role, where you will be working on an exciting, cutting-edge team.&nbsp;This position develops efficient and scalable data science systems that enable integration of machine learning (ML) applications into healthcare operations, strategy, value improvement, care advancement, patient safety and satisfaction.&nbsp;This position will partner with data scientists, application developers, data architects, and system engineers to recommend and develop ML systems and pipelines.&nbsp;This position will be responsible for learning, recommending, and implementing cutting edge machine learning methodologies and tools in creative and novel ways.&nbsp;This person would be the tone setter and first one in the Machine Learning Engineer role, with their plan to build out a team behind you.&nbsp;Fun Fact about our relationship with this client: We have placed half of their data architect team over the last 18 months with GREAT feedback on culture and the leadership.&nbsp;Qualifications  - CI / CD Experience   
  - Data Engineering experience (full project life cycle, deployment to production)   
  - Some sort of data science exposure   
  - Experience doing end-to-end implementation of an ML pipeline for ML model deployment.   
  - SQL & Python experience
